meanings: within the limits of the possible[possibility]
possibility, 가능하다 (be) possible, feasible, potential, practicable, be within the range[bounds] of possibility,

vlive.korean: 책, 예술 또는 영화 등 색다르고 다양한 해석이 가능한... Different things with many different interpretations. 듣기 View video KIM WOO SEOK : 오늘, 우석이와 함께해요
vlive.english: Different things with many different interpretations.

vlive.korean: 온수풀이 가능한 그런 이제... A place with a heated pool... 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU’EST REN] 안뇽🦋
vlive.english: A place with a heated pool...

vlive.korean: 이거 색칠도 가능한 거야? - 네 - 신기하다 - 먹을래요? You can color this? - Yes. - Amazing. - Do you want to eat it? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 수빈&휴닝카이 : 뚝딱뚝딱 공작시간
vlive.english: You can color this? - Yes. - Amazing. - Do you want to eat it?
